scripts.deploymentIII: git checkout deploy && rm -rf speed-n-power/* && cp -R ./dist/* ./ && git add . && git commit -m 'dist-to-deployII' && git push && git checkout main
scripts.dist-to-deployII: git checkout deploy && git pull && rm -rf /* && cp -r / dist/* / && git add . && git commit -m 'dist-to-deployII' && git push origin deploy && git checkout main
scripts.copy-dist: cp -R ./dist/* ./ && echo 'Successfully copied dist to the root.'
